Recap: Ava leaves a goodbye note for Coop and packs her bags to leave Springfield. Coop searches frantically for Ava. Ava ends up going for a drink with Colin who is sad about a patient he is treating. Jonathan and Coop have words and Jonathan tells him that he did a favor for Coop adding that now he can have Ava. Frank helps Coop search for Ava by placing a city-wide search. They keep missing the other. Ava goes to Towers, stalling leaving Springfield. Beth finds her and suddenly realizes that Ava doesn't know Coop and Lizzie didn't marry. Ava tells her that she thinks she will go to England and Beth offers to get her to the airport  NOW. At the airport, Ava pauses before boarding and hopes that Coop will come. After boarding, Coop runs to get on the same flight, but is too late. Lizzie phones him and tries to get him to come back to her. Suddenly, there is commotion at the gate; security brings out a handcuffed Ava. Coop tells her that he didn't marry Lizzie. She tells him that he better not leave her and says, "I'm going to make sure you don't get away from me". She handcuffs him to her as they kiss

Josh sees, hears, and talks to HB. He shows HB the plans for the project. HB smokes his cigar and tells Josh jokes and tells Josh he is proud of him. Reva cannot take a trip to Chicago with Josh and arranges for Cassie to go in her place. Josh cancels the meeting, very disappointed that Reva cannot go again. RJ gets in trouble at school for fighting; reason: he doesn't have a father and needs to make a volcano for a science project. RJ asks for Josh to come to the school. RJ's counselor thinks Josh and Cassie are married because Josh speaks so highly of Cassie. Josh helps RJ build the volcano. Afterwards, a storm comes up and Josh starts to leave. Cassie goes outside with him and thanks him again for helping RJ today. Josh tells her that he enjoyed it and it was good for him, too. He leans in to kiss her on the cheek, she moves her head and their lips meet. Josh and Cassie's kiss lingers. Afterwards, Josh looks sad and confused.
Transcript: Ava: "Coop, this place has been more than a great place to work. It's been my home. You've treated me like part of the family. That meant everything to me. I'm so sorry to leave you like this, but I think you understand why. I'll miss you, more than you'll ever imagine. Good luck with Lizzie... and the baby."
[SCENE_BREAK]
Buzz: You're still here?
Coop: Pops, what the hell do you do when you're feeling 500 different emotions all at the same time?
Buzz: 500 emotions?
Coop: Yes, 500 of them. Fury at Lizzie for lying to me, grief because I just lost a child, but also relief because I'm not married to Lizzie. I mean, do you want me to go on? The list is huge.
Buzz: I think I'd pick the positive emotion.
Coop: ( Laughs ) Dad, the positive? What possible emotion could that be?
Buzz: Hope.

And it made me realize he would never break those vows, and I would never ask him to do that.

Ava: The look on his face. He was so serious, and he reminded me of, like, a character from a romantic novel or a book or something, a movie. Coop: So what were these things? What would you go out and do?
Ava: We would just hang out together, you know? Spend time together. Have fun. Nothing in particular.

Lizzie: Coop, are you there?
Coop: Yeah, I am.
Lizzie: Okay, I also left some stuff in the nursery at the boardinghouse. I was wondering maybe when I could come by to get them.
Coop: No. I'll have them sent over. Excuse me, what's going on?
Guard: Sir, step away from the gate.
Coop: What is going on?
Guard: Step away from.
Lizzie: Coop, are you there?
Coop: Lizzie, look, gotta go.
Lizzie: Coop, no!
Ava: Stop it! Get your hands off of me! What are you doing? I already went through security!
Coop: Ava!
Ava: Stop! Coop! What are you doing here?
Coop: I'm trying to find you!
Ava: I thought you were supposed to be on your honeymoon!
Coop: No. No, no, no. I didn't go through with it. I didn't marry Lizzie.
Ava: What?!
Coop: Yes! Look, she lied to me.
Ava: No.
Coop: Lizzie lied to me. The baby is not even mine. It's Jonathan's.
Ava: Jon... no!
Coop: Yes!
Ava: Oh, my God! Okay, the last time I saw you, you were doing your vows and everything.
Coop: I know, I know, I know. You left. You took off too early. Jonathan burst in. The wedding never happened.
Ava: You're not married?!
Coop: No. I'm not anything except here with you!
Ava: You're not married! Oh! ( Laughs )
Frank: Okay. Good job, fellas. I'll take it from here. You can release them to me. I'll take them straight to the station, so...
Coop: Frank, I owe you so big.
Frank: Coop.
Coop: I owe you, big brother.
Frank: It's all right, man. That's what brothers are for. Don't worry. I'll collect some day. (Laughs)
Coop: Thank you so much.
Ava: Thank you. Thank you.
Frank: Ava, you're welcome. All right, now, let's get out of here, because I'm double-parked. Come on.
Coop: Come here.
Ava: Oh, my gosh.
Coop: I never gave up. I never gave up hope at all. Look, I'm here with you.
Ava: I...
Coop: I didn't want to let you get away.
Ava: I kind of gave up hope, because I didn't dream it could happen.
Coop: No. No, no, look, we're here together. We're here together right now.
Ava: ( Laughs ) You better not leave me, okay? This is it, for real, right?
Coop: This is us, you and me.
Ava: Okay, good.
Coop: This is the beginning of u the two of us, here, together, always.
Ava: I'm going to make sure that you don't get away from me.
Coop: What?
Ava: You're not getting away from me again.
Coop: Okay.
Ava: Okay?
[NEXT_ON]
Dinah: Honey, do we have pens?
Mallet: Look in my jacket.
Regina: You can guard my body anytime you like, A.C.
Lizzie: He's emptying out the nursery? Why? Oh, to make room for Ava.
Marina: I'm so totally over the guy. But he is crazy about me. And I think that I can use that to get us the information that we need about Harley.
Jonathan: Where the hell are you, Reva?
Reva: Ten things I want to do before I die.
